title: The Ocean Week statue should be made by Weta they have done similar work before.

replies.body: However seeing as it will cost you $200 to buy a bilbo model the size of your thumb, I hate to think what one of those would cost.

IF WE WANT IT HUUUUGE NAUTY - Around 200K~
AND IF WE WANT BIG DILD- i mean BIG ANCHOR - Around 500K~

I'd love Rito to death if they did make it huge.

~~Finally OCE gets something unique...~~
